[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Paragraphs” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1520926432109{padding-bottom: 53px !important;}”]If you are looking for a way to avoid applying brow gel, makeup and drawing in your eyebrows, brow microblading is your semi-permanent solution. With a continuous believe in education and training our brow specialists provide the highest standards in the beauty industry. Our microstroking techniques offer a personalized long-lasting solution for women’s and men’s eyebrows throughout the county.

Stop wasting your time drawing in your brows or apply makeup daily to achieve those perfect brows. 3D Microblading is a solution every busy person needs. If you have patchy eyebrows or simply wish you had more brows, eyebrow embroidery is your answer. The natural look achieved by 3D eyebrow microblading is incomparable to other solutions like eyebrow tattoos. Even if you had your eyebrows tattooed in the past, schedule a consultation with one of our specialists to see if we can help you. Feather touch eyebrows is safte, economical, and will have you looking your best in not time.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Highlighters” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1519377595442{padding-bottom: 54px !important;}”]Stop wasting your time drawing in your brows or apply makeup daily to achieve those perfect brows. 3D Microblading is a solution every busy person needs. If you have patchy eyebrows or simply wish you had more brows, eyebrow embroidery is your answer. The natural look achieved by 3D eyebrow microblading is incomparable to other solutions like eyebrow tattoos. Even if you had your eyebrows tattooed in the past, schedule a consultation with one of our specialists to see if we can help you. Feather touch eyebrows is safte, economical, and will have you looking your best in not time.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Dropcaps” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1520926524540{padding-bottom: 53px !important;}”]Avoid any sort of peeling of dry skin as you might peel out the wrong parts and create bald spots in newly reconstructed brow. Apply Aquaphor on the 3rd day of treat ment. Ointment is usually applied in the evening before sleep, some customer might need to apply it 2 times per day. It will help to keep treated area moisturized and soft for the rest of recovery period. Avoid petroleum jelly or vaseline as it can cause a reaction and block skin from breathing. No sun beds, tanning, excessive sweating in the gym, no makeup or anti aging creams on the brow area for at least 10 days. It is best to allow the brow to heal first before using any of the above.

Avoid any sort of peeling of dry skin as you might peel out the wrong parts and create bald spots in newly reconstructed brow. Apply Aquaphor on the 3rd day of treat ment. Ointment is usually applied in the evening before sleep, some customer might need to apply it 2 times per day. It will help to keep treated area moisturized and soft for the rest of recovery period. Avoid petroleum jelly or vaseline as it can cause a reaction and block skin from breathing. No sun beds, tanning, excessive sweating in the gym, no makeup or anti aging creams on the brow area for at least 10 days. It is best to allow the brow to heal first before using any of the above.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Blockquote” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1523624956117{padding-bottom: 59px !important;}”]

Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. Don’t be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people’s thinking

Mary Lee Johnson
